subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Dominating the construction market with 60% of the
nation’s existing buildings, the rural areas are
overwhelmingly built of locally made solid clay
bricks with poor thermal insulation properties and the
energy efficiency is much lower than urban areas.
Compared to the EE bricks, Chinese rural market
dominated by solid clay brick needs 50% more
energy to produce. Despite the efforts of the
Chinese government to promote EE buildings, the
achievements in urban areas cannot be extended to
rural areas owing to some recognizable barriers:
 Information and public awareness
 Policy and institutional
 Financial access
 Technical capacity
subproject.title: PIMS 3675 CC FSP: EE Bricks
